ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] New
ygData.msgSnippet: The addiction for him may not be the addiction for you.  He might be into mastering all trade skills, getting the best equipment, hitting max level with as
ygData.messageBody:
The addiction for him may not be the addiction for you. He might be into
mastering all trade skills, getting the best equipment, hitting max level
with as many different characters as he can or he might like attending
parties, picnics and other social events. Find your own niche and have fun.
There are over 400,000 monthly subscribers. No matter how you like to play,
there are bound to be some other people just like that.

The only wrong way to play EQ is to play just to pester other people. Make
friends and feel free to ask questions.

---
Lato, Paladin of Karana, Halfling of the 22nd season
Member of the Clan of Brothers

> -----Original Message-----
> From: danielleheier [mailto:danielleheier@...]
> Sent: Saturday, August 28, 2004 6:46 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] New
>
>
> Hi,
>
> I'm Danielle and I'm quite new with EverQuest. It is my husband
> indeed who kind of made me interested in the game on the internet as
> he is very good at it and can play hours (when I say hours I mean
> LOTS of hours!!!) in a row!! I saw him playing a straight 24 hours
> recently.... :) So hopefully this group will help me understand the
> addiction it does create!! :)
>
> Thank you!!
>
> Danielle
>
